charities.description: THE REGIONAL COUNCIL INCORPORATES COMMUNITIES OF FAITH AND OUTREACH MINISTRIES FROM THE FORMER CONSISTOIRE LAURENTEIN AND CONSISTOIRE DU QUÉBEC PRESBYTERY. THE REGIONAL COUNCIL OVERSEES ITS CONSTITUENT CHURCHES, MISSIONS, AND OUTREACH MINISTRIES, ADOPTING MEASURES TO PROMOTE THEIR RELIGIOUS LIFE. SERVICE IS DIRECTED TOWARDS ITS MEMBERS AND THE ECUMENICAL AND SECULAR SOCIETY WITHIN ITS GEOGRAPHIC BOUNDS, PARTICULARLY THE POOR.  THE PROGRAMS PROVIDE OVERSIGHT TO THE RELIGIOUS LIFE OF THE UNITED CHURCH, TO ADDRESS THE EPISCOPAL RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE LIFE AND WORK OF THE UNITED CHURCH WITHIN THE PROVINCE OF QUEBÉC.

charities.legalName: Église de Dieu Ministérielle de Jésus-Christ Internationale/Church of God Ministry of Jesus Christ International
charities.legalNameRaw: Église de Dieu Ministérielle de Jésus-Christ Internationale/Church of God Ministry of Jesus Christ International
charities.accountName: Church of God Ministry of Jesus Christ International
charities.description: The objectives of the Corporation are: 1. To preach, teach, disseminate, advance, demonstrate and implement the gospel of Jesus  Christ and related truths of the Holy bible within the local community, throughout Canada and to people everywhere and thus  fulfill the command of our Lord and Saviour that His Gospel be preached in all the world as a witness for all nations, in accordance  with the Declaration of Faith contained herein 2. Provided that the objects shall include only those which are, at law, exclusively  charitable and without limiting he generality of the foregoing, and to accomplish the aforesaid object: a) to uphold and further the  Declaration of Faith contained herein; b) to establish, maintain and conduct a place of worship of Almighty God; c) bring for the  knowledge of the gift of salvation through Jesus Christ, head of the Church to the local community, to the country of Canada, and  to the world at large as may be directed by our Lord and Saviour; d) to help and strengthen members in adherence to the Christian  faith and discipleship of believers;e) to establish, maintain and operate a ministry of Christian education in he knowledge of God  the guidance of all life as revealed in the Holy Scriptures of both the Old and New Testaments' f) to support and encourage unity in  the body of Christ within the Corporation and everywhere; g) To train, send forth, support and maintain students in training for  the ministry, missions and missionaries to preach the Gospel. h) To establish, maintain and operate programs and agencies to  alleviate human suffering and meet the physical and emotional needs of persons in need in the local community, the country of  Canada and the world at large in order to demonstrate and disseminate the message of Christ's love and offer of salvation.  i) to ordain and license ministers and pastors to full time and part time Christian Service.

charities.description: Children's Ministry  The Children's Ministry provides childcare for all children above the age of one until the end of elementary school. This ministry introduces what we believe as a church as well as activities to engage the children at an early age. It also organizes an annual Summer Camp, birthday parties, plays and presentations by the children.    Praise & Worship's Ministry  Worship is one of the primary ways that we experience a relationship with God and heartfelt and genuine worship is part of our core values. This Team helps facilitate meaningful and creative worship experiences for the congregation during regular church services and special programmes held by the church outside of its regular services.    Youths' Ministry  This ministry was established to create a platform for empowerment and growth for young adults and singles in their spiritual, career, social and personal lives.    Men's Ministry  The vision and purpose of the ?Men of Valor? as follows: Bring men to a saving relationship with the Lord Jesus, Equip men to teach and serve others to be world changers for Christ, Grow men in Spiritual maturity to be Christ-like and to make GOD bigger and better to an unbelieving world.    Women's Ministry  The RCCG Canada WIM is a national Women's Ministry established with a vision to reach out, build, empower and edify women in RCCG and in the surrounding communities where the ministry exists; by so doing these women would be able to fulfill their God-given purpose.This ministry is strategically positioned to be able to utilize and harness all talents, gifts and resources to build up women in the body of Christ.

charities.description: ONGOING PROGRAMM:  WE CATER TO INDIVIDUALS IN AND OUTSIDE THE IMMEDIATE CHURCH COMMUNITY, DEVOTING TIME AND MORAL SUPPORT WITH FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO THE SICK AND SHUT-IN, THE NEEDY AND SOME WIDOWS AND UNEMPLOYED INDIVIDUALS, BEREAVED FAMILIES AND INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE VICTIM OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE, PAYING REGULAR VISITS AND HELPING TO CARE FOR SENIORS IN PRIVATE HOMES, SENIORS RESIDENTS AND HOSPITALS.  DONATING TO CHILDCARE CHARITIES AND OTHER NON-PROFIT ORGANISATION FOR YOUTH AND COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES. ALSO OFFERING SPONSORSHIP TO YOUTHS OF OUR CHURCH FOR WINTER ACTIVITIES AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, SERVING OF MEALS AND FOOD BASKETS AT CHRISTMAS AND GIFTS FOR CHILDREN. COUNSELING IS ALSO DONE ON A WEEKLY BASIS.

charities.description: WE HOLD WORSHIP SERVICES WEEKLY TO PREACH, PROMOTE & ADVANCE THE SPIRITUAL TEACHING OF THE SALVATION ARMY BY PRACTICING THE RELIGIOUS OBSERVANCES, TENETS, DOCTRINES ASSOCIATED WITH THE FAITH. WE ALSO OFFER WEEKLY MUSIC LESSONS, BIBLE STUDIES, PRAYER GATHERINGS AND SUNDAY SCHOOL CLASSES.  DURING THE WEEK, WE HAVE A COMMUNITY & FAMILY SERVICES (CFS) PROGRAM THAT PROVIDES SPIRITUAL CARE, EMERGENCY FOOD AND A VARIETY OF OTHER SOCIAL ASSISTANCE AS DETERMINED BY COMMUNITY AND CLIENT NEEDS. ADDITIONALLY, THE SERVICES OFFERED IN MONTRÉAL THROUGH OUR IMMIGRATION & REFUGEE SERVICES (IRS) OFFICE ARE INTENDED TO SUPPORT ALL IMMIGRANTS AND REFUGEES WITHOUT DISCRIMINATION WHILE FOCUSING MAINLY ON THOSE NOT BENEFITTING FROM A GOVERNMENT-RUN PROGRAM WITH NEEDED RESOURCES, SUPPORT AND GUIDANCE.

charities.legalName: Trinity United Church
charities.legalNameRaw: Trinity United Church
charities.accountName: TRINITY UNITED CHURCH
charities.description: Friendship program has evolved into our FFF program - (see above).  We welcomed a new Christian Church into our sanctuary as of November.\nOn-line Sunday religious services have evolved to a hybrid format. In person as well as computer and telephone connections - up to 10% of our folks are communicating via the phone on a Zoom session). Sunday School and Church Choir returned to in-person. Our Vacation Bible school was run again in the summer allowing children from the church and the nearby commnuity to interact and learn about our Christian background.     Our sponsored Scouts Canada group - also back to in-person activities later in the year.     We also provided a weekly "living room" Zoom session (via Phone and computer) to help ease the stress of life. On-line weekly Friendship group evolved into a hybrid (in person and on-line) group called "Friends, Food and Fun" (FFF).  This group, open to all ages, allows congregants and their friends to gather in a safe environment.  Saturday morning prayer group - on-line and via phone rounded out our outreach.     Our Joint on-line services with 3 other churches in the summer continued. Bringing people together from various socio-economic classes.    ON-LINE FRENCH MINISTRY : We continued our French on-line only ministry - Église Sainte-Claire - we are able to attract people  from all over Canada to join with us in a Sunday evening service. The employment of the second minister was funded again through  direct donations and grants from the United Church of Canada.

charities.description: The Parish is dedicated to fostering spiritual growth through the advancement of Syro-Malabar Catholic religious worship, instruction, and ministry to both parishioners and community at large. in this respect, the parish: holds worship services both daily and on weekends, provides catechism and sacramental preparation, provides pastoral care to the sick, dying and those in grief, gives spiritual directions to the individuals and families in crisis, organizes special days for the parish retreats and activities, and assists  the needy and homeless in its neighborhood by providing pastoral care.

charities.description: AS WE GRADUALLY COME OUT OF THE PANDEMIC WE HAVE ORGANIZED SEVERAL LUNCHEONS AT THE CHURCH AND PLAN FOR MORE.  WE HELD A COMMUNITY GARAGE SALE TO RAISE FUNDS FOR THE LOCAL FOOD BANK.\nWE ARE A CHRISTIAN CHURCH WITH A PASTORAL MINISTRY. THE MAIN ACTIVITIES ARE THE SUNDAY MORNING WORSHIP SERVICE, THE MID-WEEK BIBLE STUDY, WORSHIP TEAM PRACTICE AND THE WOMEN'S FELLOWSHIP AND PRAYER TIME. A QUILTING GROUP MEETS IN THE CHURCH ONCE A WEEK.  THERE IS A SUNDAY SCHOOL FOR YOUNG CHILDREN DURNG THE WORSHIP SERVICE. THE PASTOR IS AVAILABLE TO MEET WITH THE MEMBERS AND ADHERENTS AS NEEDS ARISE. THE BIBLE STUDY AND WOMEN'S GROUP CONTINUE TO MEET ON ZOOM.

charities.legalName: Eglise baptiste évangélique de Rosemont
charities.legalNameRaw: Eglise baptiste évangélique de Rosemont
charities.accountName: EGLISE BAPTISTE EVANGELIQUE DE ROSEMONT
charities.description: L'Église baptiste évangélique de Rosemont exerce principalement ses activités à Montréal, dans le secteur Rosemont. Nous  o?rons des cours d'école du dimanche (études bibliques) pour tous les niveaux d'âges pour ceux qui le désirent. En semaine,  plusieurs activités ont lieu: des études bibliques et de prière les mercredis soirs et samedis matins (au bâtiment même) et dans  plusieurs foyers de nos membres, des réunions de jeunesses (13-17 ans; 18-25 ans), des réunions de couples, de femmes,  d'hommes, de personnes âgées. Nous organisons aussi une journée par mois de distribution gratuite de vêtements pour les  personnes qui habitent près de l'Église et qui en ont besoin. Nous aidons aussi les familles démunies en leur donnant des denrées  (comptoir alimentaire) aux deux semaines en collaboration avec Moisson Montréal et Bou?e-Action Rosemont. Nous o?rons aussi  un service gratuit d'aide aux personnes en di?cultés ou qui ont besoin de conseils spirituels, principalement pour les membres et  adhérents de l'Église. Toutes ces activités ont eu lieu en tenant compte des restrictions sanitaires du gouvernement du Québec et  du Canada.

charities.legalName: Groupe International des Amis de Christ
charities.legalNameRaw: Groupe International des Amis de Christ
charities.accountName: Groupe International des Amis de Christ
charities.description: aucun pour l'instant.\n1) Des séances hebdomadaires des prières pour approfondir la foi Chrétienne de ses membres, de formation biblique (pour apprendre à lire, étudier, méditer la bible), formation sur l?évangélisation (pour apprendre comment prêcher la parole de Dieu et le transmettre aux autres), de la relation d?aide (pour apprendre à accompagner ceux qui souffrent des divers maux de la vie), de communion (autour d?un repas pour se consoler et se réconforter les uns les autres), des ateliers et des conférences sur le fondement de la foi chrétienne. Toutes les activités ont eu lieu physiquement au Québec et virtuellement dans le reste du monde en particulier en République démocratique du Congo. La plage horaire utilisé était souvent à partir de 19h en semaine et l?après-midi en week-end. 2)Nous avons eu mensuellement des rencontres avec des orphelins et des personnes démunies autour d?un repas au Québec et en république démocratique du Congo. Grâce aux dons de nos membres nous les avons soulager leur pauvreté en leur offrande les denrées alimentaires et les bien de nécessité essentiels à la vie. Nous les avons également encouragés à s?intégrer dans la société pour bénéficier de tous les programmes que le gouvernement met à leurs dispositions ceux du Congo nous les avons également conseillés à développer les talents pour pourvoir gagner de quoi pour survivre. Ces rencontres avaient lieux les Week end pendant en personne au Québec et à travers nos bénévoles membres de l?organisme installés au Congo. Les séances variaient entre 2 à 3h. Un panier de Noël avait également été organisé le 24 décembre 2022. 3)Nous avons organisé une rencontre avant la rentrée scolaire au Congo et au Québec pour sensibiliser les parents des populations enfantines et jeunes non scolarisées, orphelines, démunies sur l?importance de leur soutien aux études des enfants. Nous les avons encouragés à veiller et à créer les conditions propices pour que les enfants réussissent leur année scolaire. Nous avons en plus fournit les matériels scolaires (cahiers, stylos, sacs?) aux élèves du primaire. C?était en deux séances. 4)10 ateliers et discussions ont lieu au cours de l?exercice pour offrir des opportunités aux jeunes, les encourager à travailler et à étudier pour être loin de la drogue, l'alcool, le décrochage scolaire, et la prostitution. Ces ateliers étaient combinés au soccer, le basket ainsi qu?avec la pratique musicale. Note: Nos programmes sont gérés par nos membres qui sont bénévoles.

charities.accountName: Groupe vaillants soldats de Jésus-Christ
charities.description: LE GROUPE VAILLANTS SOLDATS DE JÉSUS-CHRIST (GVSJC) EST UN ORGANISME A BUT NON LUCRATI DÛMENT CONSTITUÉ EN VERTU DE LA DE PARTIE II DE LA LOI SUR LES CORPORATIONS CANADIENNES LE 17 SEPTEMBRE 2010.  LE BUT PRINCIPAL EST D'ÉVANGÉLISER ET PRÊCHER LE MESSAGE DU SALUT TEL QUE DÉCRIT DANS LES ÉCRITURES DU NOUVEAU TESTAMENT, ET VISANT PRINCIPALEMENT LA COMMUNAUTÉ LOCALE QUI N'EST PAS RATTACHÉE À AUCUNE ÉGLISE, LE TOUT CONFORMÉMENT AUX PRATIQUES ET CROYANCES ÉTABLIES À TRAVERS LA BIBLE. L'ÉVANGÉLISATION SUSMENTIONNÉE EN UNE APPROCHE DE SOLLICITATION DIRECTE DONT L'OBJECTIF EST D'ATTIRER DES GENS QUI N'ONT AUCUNE SOUCHE RELIGIEUSE ET AURAIENT DÉMONTRÉS UN INTÉRÊT DANS LE MESSAGE SPIRITUEL.

charities.description: The organization started a new on radio program diffusing its evangelical ministry and proclaim the  Gospel of Jesus-Christ to all person\nOrganize, administer and maintain an evangelical ministry and proclaim the  Gospel of Jesus-Christ to all men ;  - employ, send and direct Christian missionaries locally and abroad to preach  the gospel of Jesus-Christ to all nation;  - Promote and share the Word of God by any means: television programs, radio  programs, internet and other media, conventions, meetings, conferences etc. ;  - Print, publish, sell and distribute Christian literature of all kinds and  establish printing equipment for that purpose : without intention of a  monetary gain to its members: conduct public and private meetings of a  religious and evangelistic nature ;  - Create and promote all activities contributing to the work of Jesus-Christ  in Quebec, Canada and across the world ;  - Acquire or rent movable and immovable properties necessary to meet its  objective;  - Organize philanthropic activities of an evangelistic nature to meet the  needs to the poor, The risk underprivileged and the elderly ;  - Receive, accept and solicits gifts, legacies, bequests and other donations  of the same nature, including movable and immovable properties, and administer  such gifts, legacies, bequest and donations ;

charities.description: À cause des effets restrictifs de la pandémie, nous avons initié un nouveau programme de présentation de conférences virtuelles, en utilisant le serveur ZOOM.\nNous présentons des informations concernant la présence dans le monde des Maîtres de Sagesse et de l'Instructeur mondial, par le moyen de sites Internet, de sites sur les réseaux sociaux, de conférences, d'infolettres, de communiqué de presse, de participation à des salons ésotériques, de diverses publicités, des abonnements à une revue spécifique produite en France, la vente de livres.    Nous gérons des listes d'adresses pour diffuser des informations et solliciter des dons.    Nous créons et encadrons l'activité de groupes de médiation québécois.

charities.description: PROPAGER L'ÉVANGILE, CÉLÉBRER LES MARIAGES RELIGIEUX, LES BAPTÊMES AINSI QUE LES FUNÉRAILLES GÉRER LES RÉGISTRES D'ÉTAT CIVIL, CONSACRER LES ENFANTS À L'ÉGLLISE EN LES PRÉPARANT POUR SERVIR LA COMMUNAUTÉ. VISITER LES MALADES RÉGULIÈREMENT, ASSISTER LE FAMILLES MONOPARENTALES ET SURTOUT LES PERSONNES VIVANT SEULES. VERNIR EN AIDE AUX PERSONNE EN DIFFICILTÉS, SOUTENIR LES ACTIVITÉ SOCIALES ET FOURNIR UN SERVICE D'AIDE ATTENTIONNÉ ET HONNÊTE FONDÉ SUR LA FOI CHRÉTIENNE. PROMOUVOIR L'INTÉGRATION DES NOUVEAUX ARRIVANTS À LA SOCIÉTÉ D'ACCUEIL.
